channel.title: Posts on VR Interaction Project 2022
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on VR Interaction Project 2022

item.title: Animal Locomotion
item.description: Brainstorming different modes of locomotion in animals to find inspiration for locomotion implementation in VR: swimming: either by pushing away water with arms/legs or by body movement crawling: similar movements as in swimming, but on land flying: up & downward movement to keep up in the air walking/running: forward movement with legs/feet jumping And getting into how four-legged animals walk: “It turns out that all four-legged animals step with their left hind leg followed by their left foreleg.
